t: Set Your Delivery Instructions - Amazon Customer Service
s: Set your delivery instructions to tell us what you'd like us to do with your parcel if you're not at home to receive it. Your delivery instructions can be accessed in multiple locations e.g. your address book, during the checkout process, via the progress tracker and on your order confirmation page.
